description.ko: 해수면 아래 10,000미터 지점에 위치한 최첨단 심해 연구 기지로, 바다의 가장 극단적인 깊이에 숨겨진 미스터리를 연구하기 위해 설계되었습니다.
description.en: A cutting-edge deep-sea research outpost stationed 10,000 meters below the surface, designed to study the mysteries of the ocean's most extreme depths.

prompt: A cinematic, ultra-realistic shot of AQUA-5, a high-tech spherical research station anchored in the Hadal zone. The station features glowing blue observation ports and titanium hulls, surrounded by bioluminescent jellyfish and hydrothermal vents. The water is dark and pressurized, with particles of marine snow illuminated by the facility's floodlights.
